host_templates._comment:
{FR: Modèle pour superviser une base de données PostgreSQL}
{EN: Template to check PostgreSQL Database}
host_templates.name: App-DB-Postgres

information.author: Centreon

description.value:
Plugin pack to monitor PostgreSQL DBMS using SQL request.
Several indicators are available but not linked to the template of host.
You have to use them manually:
* Cache-Hitratio
* Connection
* Connection-Number
* Database-Size
* Locks
* Query-Time
* Statistics
* Tablespace-Size
* Time-Sync
* Vacuum

Pack Plugin pour surveiller les SGBD PostgreSQL en utilisant des requêtes SQL.
De nombreux indicateurs sont disponibles mais ne sont pas associés au modèle d\'hôte.
Ils doivent être déployés manuellement :
* Cache-Hitratio
* Connection
* Connection-Number
* Database-Size
* Locks
* Query-Time
* Statistics
* Tablespace-Size
* Time-Sync
* Vacuum

information.monitoring_procedure:
# Monitoring procedure ## Prerequisites #### Create a user dedicated on the server. CREATE USER monitoring WITH PASSWORD 'centreon'; #### Grant SELECT Privileges on in order to use the SQL mode GRANT SELECT ON mytable TO monitoring; ### Centreon Plugin Install this plugin on each needed poller: # yum install centreon-plugin-Applications-Databases-Postgresql In order to use this template, the following RPM are needed on your poller: * postgresql * postgresql-libs * perl-DBD-Pg ## Centreon Configuration ### Create a new server postgresql Go to "Configuration > Hosts" and click "Add". Then, fill the form as shown by the following table :
Field Value

Host name

Name of the host

Alias

Host description

IP

Host IP Address

Monitored from

Monitoring Poller to use

Host Multiple Templates

App-DB-Postgre-custom
Click "Save" button. Those services were automatically created for this host:
Service Description

Bloat

Check bloat (unused amount of dead space) in table and indexes of the Postgres server

Cache-Hitratio

Check the "buffer cache hitratio" of the Postgres server

Connection

Monitor to the connection time to the db

Connection-Number

Monitor the number of connections

Locks

Check locks of the Postgres server

Ping

Monitor host response time

Query-time

Check how long a specific query takes to run

Time-Sync

Check time between poller and the Postgres server
### Host Macro Configuration The following macros must be configured on host:
Macro Description Default value Example

POSTGRESPORT

Port used to connect to the DB server

5432

5432

POSTGRESUSERNAME

the postgres db user

USERNAME

root

POSTGRESPASSWORD

the postgres db user's password

PASSWORD

p@ssw0rd
### Service Macro configuration The following macros must be configured on services:
Service Macro Description Default Value Example

Bloat

Warning Threshold

1GB

1GB

Critical Threshold

2GB

--exclude=postgres,template0,template1

information.name: PostgreSQL

service_templates._comment: {FR: Contrôle permettant de vérifier le temps d'exécution des requêtes d'un serveur Postgres.} {EN: Check request time of the Postgres server.}
service_templates.name: App-DB-Postgres-Query-Time

service_templates._comment: {FR: Contrôle permettant de vérifier les types de "locks" d'un serveur Postgres.} {EN: Check locks of the Postgres server.}
service_templates.name: App-DB-Postgres-Locks

service_templates._comment: {FR: Contrôle permettant de vérifier le nombre de connexions au serveur Postgres.} {EN: Check connection number to the Postgres server.}
service_templates.name: App-DB-Postgres-Connection-Number

service_templates._comment: {FR: Contrôle permettant de vérifier la connexions au serveur Postgres.} {EN: Check connection to the Postgres server.}
service_templates.name: App-DB-Postgres-Connection

service_templates._comment: {FR: Contrôle permettant de vérifier le "buffer cache hitratio" du serveur Postgres.} {EN: Check the "buffer cache hitratio" of the Postgres server.}
service_templates.name: App-DB-Postgres-Cache-Hitratio

service_templates._comment: {FR: Contrôle permettant de vérifier la différence de temps entre le poller et le serveur Postgres.} {EN: Check time between poller and the Postgres server.}
service_templates.name: App-DB-Postgres-Tablespace-Size

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle permettant de vérifier les types de requêtes: commit, rollback, insert, delete, update.}

 {EN: Check database statistics: commit, rollback, insert, delete, update.}
service_templates.name: App-DB-Postgres-Statistics

service_templates._comment: {FR: Contrôle l'exécution du Vacuum sur une BD depuis un nombre de jours donné.} {EN: Check the execution of Vacuum on a DB for a given amount of days.}
service_templates.name: App-DB-Postgres-Vacuum

service_templates._comment: {FR: Contrôle permettant de vérifier la différence de temps entre le poller et le serveur Postgres.} {EN: Check time between poller and the Postgres server.}
service_templates.name: App-DB-Postgres-Time-Sync

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle permettant d'exécuter une requête SQL personnalisée renvoyant une donnée numérique.}

{EN: Check allowing to execute a custom SQL request with a digital answer.}
service_templates.name: App-DB-Postgres-Sql-Statement

service_templates._comment: {FR: Contrôle la taille des bases de données.} {EN: Check the databases size.}
service_templates.name: App-DB-Postgres-Database-Size
